description:
Izetta`s victory has won a brief peace for the dukedom, and the princess intends to enjoy it. Together, they practice dancing, and go to a pie shop.  But there`s trouble brewing in the background, as young private Jonas has discovered her secret. How far is Seig willing to go to keep the country safe, especially when innocents are involved?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 穏やかな日々に... An einem ruhigen Tag...
